com.k2.Util

Class FileUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.k2.Util.FileUtil

  • public class FileUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This static utility provides methods for handling Files
    Author:
    simon

      FileUtil() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void deleteCascade(java.io.File f)
      This method deletes the given file and if it is a directory recursively deletes all its contents
      static java.io.File fetch(java.io.File dir, java.lang.String search)
      This method returns the file with the given name from the given directory if it exists
      static boolean isLocked(java.io.File f)
      This method checks whether the given file is locked using the FileLock API
      static java.util.List<java.io.File> listForExtension(java.io.File dir, java.lang.String... exts)
      This method returns a list of file from the given directory for the given extension
      static java.nio.channels.FileLock lock(java.io.File f)
      This method attempts to lock the given file using the FileLock API and returns the FileLock that locked the file

    • Method Detail

      • fetch

        public static java.io.File fetch(java.io.File dir,
                                 java.lang.String search)
        This method returns the file with the given name from the given directory if it exists
        Parameters:
        dir - The directory to search for the file
        search - The name of the file to find
        Returns:
        The file in the directory with the given name if it exists or null

      • listForExtension

        public static java.util.List<java.io.File> listForExtension(java.io.File dir,
                                                            java.lang.String... exts)
        This method returns a list of file from the given directory for the given extension
        Parameters:
        dir - The directory to search for files with the given extension
        exts - The list of extensions to compare to files in the directory with or without the period '.'
        Returns:
        A list of files in the given directory that end with any of the given file extensions

      • deleteCascade

        public static void deleteCascade(java.io.File f)
        This method deletes the given file and if it is a directory recursively deletes all its contents
        Parameters:
        f - The file or directory to delete

      • lock

        public static java.nio.channels.FileLock lock(java.io.File f)
                                       throws FileLockedException
        This method attempts to lock the given file using the FileLock API and returns the FileLock that locked the file
        Parameters:
        f - The file to lock
        Returns:
        The FileLock that is locking the file
        Throws:
        FileLockedException - If the file is already locked

      • isLocked

        public static boolean isLocked(java.io.File f)
        This method checks whether the given file is locked using the FileLock API
        Parameters:
        f - The file to check if it is locked
        Returns:
        True if the file is already locked
